details.title: Responsibilities
items: Optimising web assets for speed and performance.
Troubleshooting of technical and coding-related issues to resolve problems quickly and efficiently.
Designing sites to be compatible with top browsers, including Firefox, Chrome, and Safari.
Testing websites and performed troubleshooting prior to deployment.
Developing company website using Sketch App and by converting mock-up designs into HTML code.
Maintained and supported Macintosh, Windows, and Linux PC for end users.
Strengthened the company brand and identity by designing distinctive websites, and logos.
Created eye-catching and functional digital design concepts across various platforms to strengthen company brand and identity.

details.title: Achievements
items: Developed user interfaces using NuxtJS alongside VuetifyJS.
Developed RESTful APIs on top of Adonis.JS as well as practising various authentication techniques such as JWT and API tokens.
Designed various graphical pieces (logos and promos) using Affinity Designer and Affinity Photo.
